participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and family-oriented, yet sometimes overwhelmed by responsibilities.
participant_1.background: I wash my clothes when I have to. I sometimes think I am too busy to keep up with my family, but I try my best because I love them. I'm afraid of not being able to protect my son from harm. I'd love to show off my gummy worm collection to my friends if I was famous. I am an average weight, but I am not happy with it.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and music-loving, valuing comfort and close relationships.
participant_2.background: My mornings consist of listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers while I get ready for the day. I wake up, check my schedule for the day, and go about my business. I like my job, but I don't have a lot of family support. My mom is my favorite person of all people. I only dress up for special occasions because I prefer to be comfortable in my own skin.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do in the morning?
I'd say listening to my favorite band, Red Hot Chili Peppers, while I get ready for the day.
I'm not familiar with them, but I'll have to give them a listen sometime.
Oh, you definitely should! They're a great band.
What's your favorite song by them?
My favorite song is either "Give it Away" or "Under the Bridge".
I'll have to check them out.
You should! I'm sure you'll like them.
What's your favorite thing about your job?
I'd say the people I work with. They're all really great people.
I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Yeah, I do. It's pretty great.
Do you have any family support?
Not really. My mom is my favorite person, but she's the only one who really supports me.
It's okay. I'm used to it by now.
Well, I'm sure you're doing great.
